mapper.insert: insert into `order` (order_id, user_id, contact_name, order_date, order_state, total_ticket_price, total_fuel_surcharge, total_airport_tax, total_price, cellphone, email, zip_code) values (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{contactName}, #{orderDate}, #{orderState}, #{totalTicketPrice}, #{totalFuelSurcharge}, #{totalAirportTax}, #{totalPrice}, #{cellphone}, #{email}, #{zipCode})
mapper.select: select order_id, flight.*, passenger.* from `order` inner JOIN `order_item` on `order`.order_id = `order_item`.order_id where `order`.order_id = #{orderId}
